title: Research data quality: Read-input, Edit-input, Write-input
description: Analyze samples of Read-input, Edit-input, Write-input. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (Read-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'Read-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (Read-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (Edit-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'Edit-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (Edit-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (Write-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'Write-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (Write-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
